name: Content Acquisition & Rights Management
description: Transform content acquisition from rights discovery through negotiation, contract management, and rights tracking. Agentic AI automates rights research, analyzes licensing terms, generates contract drafts, tracks expiration dates, and ensures compliance—accelerating content acquisition while reducing legal risks.
businessGoal: Accelerate content acquisition cycles, optimize licensing costs, and ensure rights compliance through intelligent automation of research, negotiation, and contract management.

work: Automated rights research and availability checking across global markets
Intelligent contract analysis and term extraction from licensing agreements
Automated contract generation with standard terms and customizations
Rights expiration tracking and renewal alerts
Compliance validation against usage rights and restrictions
Royalty calculation and payment processing automation
workforce: Content acquisition managers focus on strategic negotiations and relationships
Legal teams review exceptions and complex rights structures only
Rights administrators handle escalated compliance issues
Finance teams receive pre-calculated royalty reports
Reduced manual research and data entry tasks
workbench: AI-powered rights databases and research tools
digitalCore: Content Management Systems (Adobe Experience Manager, Sitecore)

agents.name: Rights Research Agent
agents.responsibility: Researches content rights availability, ownership, and licensing terms across markets

agents.name: Contract Analysis Agent
agents.responsibility: Extracts and analyzes contract terms, identifies restrictions and obligations

agents.name: Contract Generation Agent
agents.responsibility: Generates contract drafts based on templates and negotiation terms

agents.name: Rights Tracking Agent
agents.responsibility: Monitors rights expiration dates, usage compliance, and renewal requirements

agents.name: Royalty Calculation Agent
agents.responsibility: Calculates royalties based on usage data and contract terms

benefits: 40-60% reduction in content acquisition cycle time
20-35% optimization in licensing costs through better negotiation insights
60-80% reduction in manual research and data entry

risksAndControls.description: Incorrect rights research leading to licensing violations
risksAndControls.mitigationStrategy: Human review of high-value contracts, validation against legal guidelines
risksAndControls.monitoringApproach: Monitor rights compliance, track research accuracy
risksAndControls.escalationPath: Escalate to legal team for complex rights structures

risksAndControls.description: Contract generation errors causing unfavorable terms
risksAndControls.mitigationStrategy: Human approval for contracts, template validation
risksAndControls.monitoringApproach: Review contract terms, track negotiation outcomes
risksAndControls.escalationPath: Escalate to legal for high-value contracts

risksAndControls.description: Rights expiration missed causing content unavailability
risksAndControls.mitigationStrategy: Automated tracking, renewal alerts, proactive monitoring
risksAndControls.monitoringApproach: Monitor expiration dates, track renewal rates
risksAndControls.escalationPath: Alert content team for upcoming expirations

insights: Content acquisition delays cost media companies $500M annually in lost opportunities
Rights violations result in average $2M per incident in penalties and legal costs
Automated contract processing reduces errors by 70%
Proactive rights tracking prevents 60% of expiration-related content gaps
trends: Demand for real-time rights availability checking
Integration of blockchain for rights verification

currentSteps.description: Manual rights research and availability checking
Manual contract analysis and term extraction
Manual rights registration and tracking setup
Manual compliance monitoring and renewal management

agenticSteps.description: Automated rights research and availability checking
agenticSteps.errorHandling: Flag for human review if low confidence

agenticSteps.description: Automated contract analysis and term extraction
agenticSteps.errorHandling: Route to legal if complex terms
Route to human for high-value contracts

agenticSteps.description: Automated rights tracking and expiration monitoring
agenticSteps.errorHandling: Alert content team if issues
Route to finance for high-value payments
Alert legal team if violations
